e="preserve">William Leon Goldenberg (February 10, 1936 – August 3, 2020) was an American composer and songwriter. He was best known for his work on television and movie. He was born in New York City. He was known for composing the scores of "Kojak", "Rhoda" and "Play It Again, Sam".
Goldenberg died on August 3, 2020 in New York City from heart failure at the age of 84.
